content:
Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "bricks", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 17, "index": 21}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "cooked_chicken", "quantity": 32, "index": 41}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 54, "index": 43}, {"type": "crimson_fungus", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft oak_slabs I need to place oak_planks in the top row of the crafting grid. I have 3 oak_planks in my inventory, which is enough to craft 2 oak_slabs. I will start by moving one oak_plank from slot 26 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_slab
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 21, "index": 14}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 17, "index": 21}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 59, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "cooked_chicken", "quantity": 32, "index": 41}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 54, "index": 43}, {"type": "crimson_fungus", "quantity": 27, "index": 45}]
thought: I still need to place 2 more oak_planks in the crafting grid to craft oak_slabs. I will move another oak_plank from slot 26 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
